type: Place tender for shipment of two refrigerated maritime containers
short_summary: Purchase two refrigerated maritime shipping containers and deliver to Ottawa, Ontario
description: purchase two (2) refrigerated marine shipping containers. The goods are to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario
full_summary:
================
### Request for Proposal
#### Two Refrigerated Maritime Shipping Containers

**Tender Reference: WS4110227141-Doc4110250599**
**Publication Date: August 16, 2023**
**Tender Closing Date: September 14, 2023**
**Tender Status: Expired**

**Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)**, on behalf of the **Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)**, is soliciting proposals for the purchase of two (2) refrigerated marine shipping containers.

**Delivery Location:** 
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Trade Agreements:** 
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Solicitation Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on the **lowest price**.

**如何iche orientation: Due ngày/Times for Bid Submission:**
Please submit all required documents and bids by September 14, 2023 at 14:00HAE (2:00 PM EDT). Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information:**
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Chantal DesGroseilliers (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17142741?extsite=MTcxNDI3NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
